author: Huawei
description:
How can more than 1000 #Huawei campuses across 170 countries and regions deliver superior security, efficiency and intelligence every day?

The answer lies in the Huawei Intelligent Operation Center (IOC) and the campus administrators who oversee its daily operations. Huawei's intelligent campus solution connects systems through a unified digital platform, monitored by administrators and powered by AI. It enables real-time adjustments that make campuses safer, more comfortable, and more sustainable.
title: Behind the Scenes: A Day in the Life of a Huawei Campus Administrator
